thread.section_title: Samtechonline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Samtechonline | samtechonline.com
thread.title: Michael C.

author: Michael C.
title: Michael C.
text: Ordered a Hifiman-400i (display model) from STO for two reasons: The price was very competitive as plenty of reviewers have pointed out and STO is a authorized dealer which means full warranty. Ordered it midday on a Monday and received it in the same week, on Wednesday. Package was double boxed and padded pretty well. The product itself had no apparent problems, it looked unused and worked fine out of the box.
